data.meta_description: Servis Facilities Limited | 1,521 followers on LinkedIn. The One Hub Solution. Transforming Facilities Management. | Servis Group, with its commitment to excellence, operates across three specialized divisions—Security, Facilities, and Logistics—setting the standard as one of the UK’s foremost providers of comprehensive Security & Facilities management solutions. With a dedicated focus on delivering effective long-term strategies, Servis Group caters to multiple sectors, ensuring complete solutions that meet the unique needs of our customers. As experts in the FM and compliance industry, we possess the ability and freedom to operate seamlessly, consistently delivering the right results for our valued clientele.

Happy Earth Day! 🌍 At Servis Group, we're committed to reducing our carbon footprint and protecting the environment. Here are some steps we're taking: 1. Green Fleet Management: Transitioning to electric/hybrid vehicles & optimizing routes. 2. Remote Monitoring: Using tech to reduce physical patrols & emissions. 3. Energy-Efficient Equipment: Installing eco-friendly systems in our facilities. 4. Paperless Operations: Going digital to cut paper usage & transportation emissions. 5. Green Training: Educating employees on sustainability & encouraging eco-commuting. 6. Environmental Reporting: Monitoring and reducing our carbon emissions. Join us in making a difference for a greener future! 🌱💚 #EarthDay #Sustainability #GreenInitiative #servisgroup
